bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Creating a scalar wdiget without x-axis breaks the dashboard
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Saving a widget without x-axis breaks the whole dashboard. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
The form allows to delete the x-axis selection, and does not prevent saving the widget. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/89025101-86159200-d326-11ea-818a-ca136bd85af1.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Use a default value or prevent saving the form. In any case it should not break the whole dashboard. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
v1.1
